name: Dyschronia: Chronos Alternate - Episode II: The Eleventh Hour
storyline:
The trial to bring the Professor’s murderer to justice has only just drawn to a close when the indicted marionette Systelia appears before you.
Fugitive and Supervisor—you make an unlikely team as you hunt down the truth.

In the Institute’s sealed-off experimental sector, you discover evidence of a past experiment and the mysterious figure holding the city’s secrets.

The truth may be closer than ever, but the never-ending string of incidents is pushing Astrum Close to the point of no return.

When the sound of gunfire shatters the last semblance of tranquility in the city, one question remains: who or what lies in the sights?
summary:
Only four days remain until the city meets its fate. Do you have what it takes to stave off oblivion?

Episode II brings unexpected twists to the game's lauded narrative, providing answers and posing questions in this gripping prelude to the third and final act.
